text: Domenico di Cecco, also known by Domenico di Cecco di Baldi (active mid-15th century) was an Italian painter of the Quattrocento. ==Biography== He was born in Gubbio, and active there, where he was a pupil of Ottaviano Nelli. Archivio storico per le Marche e per l'Umbria, Volume 3, page 34. In 1444, he painted a Grieving Madonna and St Peter for the church of Santa Maria della Piaggiola in Gubbio. ==References== Category:15th-century Italian painters Category:Quattrocento painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:People from Gubbio Category:Umbrian painters
title: Domenico di Cecco
